rules.text: Tag sensitive content such as violence/blood, NSFW content, and other potentially upsetting or triggering topics, AND hide them under a Content Warning (CW).

The following content will be removed and will result in revocation of access to the service: sexual depictions of minors (this includes loli), content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism, conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.

The following content will be removed and may result in account suspension: racism, sexism, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, ableism, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation of all of the above.
Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is disallowed.
No reposting other people's work without credit and analysis/opinion.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
Do not share false or misleading information that may lead to physical harm
No NFT content. Please post those on crypto-related instances on the fediverse.
Human art only. If your animal friends can make art then that's ok; but please no AI art.
No flooding the public timelines (making lots of public posts in quick succession).
